name: Habib Khusraw
story: Idris Zamani comes from a family of military veterans and has always felt a sense of duty to serve his country. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his outstanding performance as a scout. His superiors have praised him for his courage and resourcefulness under pressure. However, Idris struggles to maintain personal relationships due to the demands of his job and the constant danger he faces in the field.
